title: Imperial Lux not Showing Up in the store!

replies.body:
Hey Rudewolf,

This was due to her being on sale in the [Snowstorm Sale](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/caution-snowstorm-sale-incoming). If a skin is on sale in the normal shop, it won't be available in Your Snowdown Shop. She is no longer on sale, so you should be able to grab her in Your Snowdown Shop.
